Description.Text:
Position In one of the most beautiful bays of the Riviera Ligure, a few steps from a beautiful sandy beach and the green plants of the hill, the Hotel 5 Terre is at your disposal to make your stay pleasant and relaxing, in a refined family comfortable.
Restaurant Treatment: B&B with breakfast buffet.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations The hotel has a reception, internet fee, bar stays, breakfast room, TV room, lift, garden with tables, chairs and sun umbrellas. free parking depending on availability. Equipment: free pool, private beach to be paid locally (approx. â‚¬ 16.00 / day 1 + 1 sunbed umbrella +1), tennis courts pay to 200 meters from the hotel.
